A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My heart is broken. I'm not sure what movie all these 'critics' are watching but the movie I saw was an embarrassing mess which gave no consideration to the OT. Sure the visuals were pretty great but the story.... the story?! Wow it was just terrible. The force seems to have been reduced to a convienent excuse for explaining the absurdity of the movie. Leias 'Mary poppins
Moment' is a disaster. Luke is given a totally insulting end. Yoda thinks 'yeah why not torch the thing I dedicated my whole life to. Rose and Fin might as well not been in this movie for all the good they did.

It feels like Disneys were desperate to erase anything precious about the OT. George\, we need you back!

In short\, I have always LOVED Star Wars but this movie is an insult\, hate really isn't too strong.
